name: BRING THE HEAT: THE GAME
description:
Have you ever wanted to attend Scotland's premier Super Smash Bros Melee tournament series?

Well now you can! 

Only on the Nintendo Game Boy™

Use Z and X for the A and B buttons and the arrow keys for the D-pad.

Bring The Heat is a monthly Super Smash Bros Melee hosted in Glasgow, Scotland.

Visit our event page at https://www.start.gg/tournament/bring-the-heat to learn more and join our community at https://scotland.melee.uk/.
